summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services provides information on the quality of nursing homes as part of its Care Compare tool. Medicare & Medicaid Services has worked to ensure that nursing home information on Care Compare is useful to consumers and lets them compare data among nursing homes, such as how many nurses a facility has on staff. However, we found that Care Compare...
title: Nursing Homes: CMS Offers Useful Information on Website and Is Considering Additional Steps to Assess Underlying Data
